lumis.portal.channel

Class ChannelDaoJdbc

  • java.lang.Object
    • lumis.portal.channel.ChannelDaoJdbc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChannelDao

    public class ChannelDaoJdbc
extends Object
implements IChannelDao
    Dao implementation for channels, based on JDBC.

    4.0.0
